article_title: Felicia Kornbluh and Gwendolyn Mink: Poor mothers don't matter in welfare policy
article_text: We're an independent nonprofit organization, your donation helps fund the digging, and, it's tax deductible.

article_metadata.news_keywords: felicia kornbluh, gwendolyn mink, temporary assistance to needy families, welfare, vermont, vermont news, vermont events, vermont press releases

og.description: Far from empowering families economically to rise out of poverty, welfare reform has proliferated policing mechanisms against poor people while repudiating the original purpose of welfare: income support to help custodial parents make ends meet.
